function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unnecessary stand-by plug loads, such as computers, contributing to high energy consumption","Impact":"Increased energy consumption and potential strain on energy resources","Mitigation":"Implement power management settings on computers and unplug devices not in use","Technologies":"Smart power strips, energy monitoring systems","People":"Building occupants, facility managers","Owner":"Facility management team"},{"Description":"Empty refrigerators contributing to high energy consumption","Impact":"Wastage of energy and resources","Mitigation":"Implement a system to monitor refrigerator usage and turn off units when empty","Technologies":"Refrigerator energy usage monitors, automated power controls","People":"School staff, facility managers","Owner":"Facility management team"},{"Description":"Unoccupied building leading to higher energy demand than necessary","Impact":"Higher energy costs and wastage of resources","Mitigation":"Adjust energy contracts based on actual building usage and implement energy-saving measures","Technologies":"Energy monitoring systems, occupancy sensors","People":"Municipality, facility management team","Owner":"Municipality"}]}
